content: You’ll find the cave in question just above the crevice on the left side of the path through the Squall Hideout region. Enter the large tunnel and keep to the left to defeat any Rock Guai you come across.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone'.
The content is as follows:
You’ll find the cave in question just above the crevice on the left side of the path through the Squall Hideout region. Enter the large tunnel and keep to the left to defeat any Rock Guai you come across.
